familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former member of Trump Panama Hotel Management LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest.

Former president/director/chairman of the now-dormant or inactive Trump Panama Hotel Management Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump Panama Hotel Management Member Corp.
